Subject: Hot Rod vs Unitron

From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

OOC: He is actually a Maximal now. He just likes to brag about his
Autobot days.

::Hot Rod::

He jumps up, and to the side avoiding the energy blasts and bolts.
However several of the optics hit his leg.
"Not bad. But your inexperianced. I've been doing this for 600 years.
Now lets make this a real fight."
Hot Rod ingaged his boosters and raced towards Unitron. When in rang he
attempted a karate kick at Unitron's head.
